fr.upmc.dtgui.example.gui
Interface RobotTeleoperationBoard

All Known Implementing Classes:
AnotherLittleRobotTeleoperationBoard, LittleRobotTeleoperationBoard
public interface RobotTeleoperationBoard

The interface RobotTeleoperationBoard defines the minimal set of functionalities of robot teleoperation boards expected by the hosting teleoperation stations.

Created on : 2011-10-10

Version:
$Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
Author:
Jacques Malenfant

Method Summary
 void connectRobot(InstrumentedRobot lr)
          connect a robot to the current teleoperation board when the robot becomes teleoperable (within the control radius of the hosting station).
 void disconnectRobot(InstrumentedRobot lr)
          disconnect a robot from the current teleoperation board when the robot is no longer teleoperable (not within the control radius of the hosting station).
 boolean isRobotConnected()
          check if a robot is currently connected to the board.
 SensorDataReceptorInterface makeSensorDataReceptor(PositionDisplay positionDisplay, java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<RobotStateData> sensorDataQueue, int absoluteX, int absoluteY, int controlRadius)
          The method makeSensorDataReceptor creates a thread to receive sensor data from the robot.
 void setVisible(boolean b)
          makes the board visible or invisible, when the robot is controllable and the operator selects it to act upon it or deselects it to select another robot.
 

Method Detail

makeSensorDataReceptor

SensorDataReceptorInterface makeSensorDataReceptor(PositionDisplay positionDisplay,
                                                   java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<RobotStateData> sensorDataQueue,
                                                   int absoluteX,
                                                   int absoluteY,
                                                   int controlRadius)
The method makeSensorDataReceptor creates a thread to receive sensor data from the robot.

Contract

 pre    true                    // no precondition.
 post   true                    // no postcondition.

Parameters:
positionDisplay - the display on which the robot is visualized.
sensorDataQueue - the data queue used to receive robot positions.
absoluteX - hosting station absolute position (x coordinate)
absoluteY - hosting station absolute position (y coordinate)
controlRadius - radius of the circle within which robot are teleoperable.
Returns:
a thread to receive sensor data from the robot.

connectRobot

void connectRobot(InstrumentedRobot lr)
connect a robot to the current teleoperation board when the robot becomes teleoperable (within the control radius of the hosting station).

Contract

 pre    true                    // no precondition.
 post   true                    // no postcondition.

Parameters:
lr - the robot to be connected.

disconnectRobot

void disconnectRobot(InstrumentedRobot lr)
disconnect a robot from the current teleoperation board when the robot is no longer teleoperable (not within the control radius of the hosting station).

Contract

 pre    true                    // no precondition.
 post   true                    // no postcondition.

Parameters:
lr - the robot to be disconnected.

setVisible

void setVisible(boolean b)
makes the board visible or invisible, when the robot is controllable and the operator selects it to act upon it or deselects it to select another robot.

Contract

 pre    true                    // no precondition.
 post   true                    // no postcondition.

Parameters:
b - true is the robot has to become controllable.

isRobotConnected

boolean isRobotConnected()
check if a robot is currently connected to the board.

Contract

 pre    true                    // no precondition.
 post   true                    // no postcondition.

Returns:
true if a robot is currently connected to the board.
